Intimidate
[i]Judgment[/i] –When The Black Knight enters, he fights target creature. If The Black Knight wins, draw cards equal to that creatures power. If The Black Knight loses, exile him from your graveyard and he becomes plotted.
[i]Luna[/i] – Whenever a creature blocks The Black Knight, it gets -0/-X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. This effect can't reduce those creatures toughness to be less than 1.
[i]Alondite [/i]– Whenever The Black Knight deals damage, put two +1/+1 counters on him, then target opponent mills a card for each counter on him.
